<MethodEndpoint

This operation allows you to download an image from a conversation. 

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails

>
  
</ParamsDetails>
